author: Special Correspondent
text:
Some areas in the city, including Chetpet, Egmore, Teynampet, Perambur, Otteri, Nungambakkam and parts of Vysarpadi, Chepauk and Ayanavaram, may not receive adequate water supply on Saturday as Chennai Metrowater plans repair work at its Kilpauk water treatment plant.

Residents may contact Area Engineer - V (8144930905), Area Engineer - VI (8144930906) and Area Engineer - VIII (8144930908).
title: Water supply may be hit today
